## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                              | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `autofocus`   | `autofocus`   | Identify the autofocus property of textarea              | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `cols`        | `cols`        | Identify the cols property of textarea                   | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Identify the disabled property of textarea               | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `maxlength`   | `maxlength`   | Identify the maxlength property of textarea              | `number`  | `100000`    |
| `name`        | `name`        | Name prop of the textarea                                | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Placeholder appear when there isn't text in the textarea | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `readonly`    | `readonly`    | Identify the readonly property of textarea               | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `required`    | `required`    | Identify the required property of textarea               | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `rows`        | `rows`        | Identify the rows property of textarea                   | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `text`        | `text`        | Test inside the textarea when rendered the first time    | `string`  | `undefined` |
